techmeme.title: Leaked financial figures: Stripe doubled its free cash flow in 2024 to about $2.2B and grew revenues by about 28% to $5.1B; Chime grew revenues by 31% to $1.7B (Cory Weinberg/The Information)
Island, which offers a Chromium-based secure enterprise browser, raised a $250M Series E led by Coatue at a $4.8B valuation, taking its total funding to ~$730M (Kyt Dotson/SiliconANGLE)
Sources: Italy hands tax demands to Meta, X, and LinkedIn in the last step in its VAT case, seeking €887.6M from Meta, €12.5M from X, and ~€140M from LinkedIn (Reuters)
Waze says it is removing Google Assistant for iPhone users, citing "ongoing difficulties" with the integration, after recently testing a Gemini-based assistant (Emma Roth/The Verge)
TD Cowen: Microsoft walked away from new data center projects in the US and Europe that had been set to consume 2 gigawatts, a sign of AI computing oversupply (Bloomberg)
